hibernate-mapping.sql-query: from Role role where 1 = 1 <if isNotBlank(systemUnitId)> and role.systemUnitId = :systemUnitId </if> <if isNotBlank(code)|| isNotBlank(name) || isNotBlank(remark)> and (1 = 2 <if isNotBlank(code)> or lower(role.code) like '%${code?lower_case}%' </if> <if isNotBlank(name)> or lower(role.name) like '%${name?lower_case}%' </if> <if isNotBlank(remark)> or lower(role.remark) = lower(:remark) </if> ) </if> and role.categoryUuid in (:categoryUuids) order by ${orderBy}
